Las Lomas Model United Nations Conference

Days : Hours : Minutes : Seconds

ESTEEMED DELEGATES AND ADVISORS, ,

On behalf of the Las Lomas Model UN Conference Secretariat, we’d like to welcome you to LLMUNC ‘25, our first-ever conference! We’re a one-day conference with 5 committees — No Position Papers Needed. From debating the political situation in the South China Sea to an ADHOC mystery, there’s sure to be something at LLMUNC ‘25 for everyone.

Las Lomas High is conveniently located in Walnut Creek, CA, an up-and-coming hub for its atmosphere and food. With plenty of places to explore during breaks, LLMUNC ‘25 is an experience beyond the four walls of a committee session. Additionally, our team of Las Lomas/Amador Valley chairs with competitive experience at local and collegiate conferences are able to provide advice for first-timers and advanced feedback for experienced delegates. All levels of experience welcome!

LLMUNC Information:
Conference Date: February 22, 2025 to February 22, 2025
Registration Opens: January 8, 2025
Registration Closes: February 10, 2025
5 Committees
No positions papers

Registration opens on January 8th and closes on February 10th . We wish each delegate the best of luck and hope to see them at LLMUNC ‘25!

Very Truly Yours,
Kimberly Huang & Harrshwin Sivakumaran Thangaraj
Questions? llmodelunclub@gmail.com
